name: Swirl Brownies
author: Donna Stamp
instructions: Prepare brownie mix as directed on package. Combine cream cheese and sugar, mixing until well blended. Blend in egg and vanilla. Reserve 1⁄2 cup of batter; spread remaining batter onto bottom of greased 13 x 9 inch baking pan. Cover with cream cheese mixture, spoon on reserved batter. Cut through batter with knife several times for marbled effect. Bake at 350°, 35 to 40 minutes or until cream cheese mixture is lightly browned. Cool; cut into squares.
